# display_df

A simple interactive DataFrame viewer with enhanced search, built with PyQt5.

## Installation

```bash
pip install display_df
```

## Usage

```python
import pandas as pd
from display_df.display_df import display_df

df = pd.DataFrame({...})
display_df(df)
```

## Features
- Interactive search by column or all columns
- PyQt5 GUI
